channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024020779
item.description:
Report X-2024020779

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-07
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Liquid leaked wetting and contaminating the top and sides of the contents and carton. Pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and sent to QA where it was later transferred to the HMPA. DescribePack: A loose cap on 1 x 20 liters plastic bladder in a fiberboard carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2024020745
item.description:
Report X-2024020745

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-30
  • City: WALLINGFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was scanned to drivers truck ; but then package handler noticed box was wet and had an odor. Pkg was set aside for QA and with all markings/label brought to the hazmat cage to further inspect. all plastic containers were slightly soiled from one of the leaking bottles DescribePack: Loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Brought to QA damage cage to process

item.title: Report X-2024020323
item.description:
Report X-2024020323

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-15
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg found wrapped up in Hazbag liners placed in lined Hazmat bin. Pkg placed sideways in bin. Carton wet, ripped and deteriorated by the chemical. DescribePack: A cross threaded cap on 1 x 1 gal plastic bottle allowed liquid to leak causing damage to and contaminating the contents, carton and liner. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2024020303
item.description:
Report X-2024020303

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T00:33:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-12
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was found wet and was placed in a lined Hazmt bin and taken to the HMPA. DescribePack: Loose caps on 2 x 1 gal metal F-Type cans that allowed liquid to leak wetting a portion of the top and side of the carton as well as wetting the contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2024020289
item.description:
Report X-2024020289

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T00:33:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-12
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg arrived wet and was placed in a lined Hazmat bin that was brought immediately to the HMPA. DescribePack: A cracked seam inside the handle of 1 x 1 gal plastic bottle allowed liquid to leak wetting and contaminating the contents and carton causing the carton rip near one corner. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2024020525
item.description:
Report X-2024020525

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-31
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The unmarked pkg was placed in an unlined unauthorized plastic bin upon discovery of release. Pkg was sent to QA and later transferred to the HMPA. DescribePack: Friction lids failed on paint cans with no clips in carton with no Hazmat markings or orientation arrows required for shipment containing liquid. Contents are dented/crushed due to no packing material in carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.

item.title: Report X-2024020521
item.description:
Report X-2024020521

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-26
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet pkg with no Hazmat markings was placed in an unlined unauthorized plastic bin and sent to QA where it was later transferred to the HMPA. DescribePack: Wet inner pkg with Ltd Qty diamond printed on it containing 8 x 16 ounce metal bottles. Caps loose on four of the metal bottles allowing liquid to leak wetting most of the inner carton and approximately half of the outer carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.

item.title: Report X-2024020499
item.description:
Report X-2024020499

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-24
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer, sustained lateral impact near paint can lid, leaked. Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release. QA member was called to Unload area to retrieve damaged package. DescribePack: Paint can is dented near lid, permitting leakage. Entire lid came loose, permitting leakage. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of flammable liquid.
